title: The Bomb
report: Mindset: just got off work feeling a bit excited and anxious due to 8 hours of manual labor and recent delivery of RC's.
Previous drug experience: Alsmost everything, a lot.
Insuffilate 10 mg ethylphenidate. Slight burn, not as painful as most reports report.
Slight mood boost, most likely placebo. Drain not too repulsive.
Definate stimulant properties, not unlike methamphetamine.
Stimulation building. Mild euphoria present, building.
Niiiice, excellent body feeling, mental clarity, rush, moderate euphoria.

Inject 10mg. This is when I lose track of time.  I feel wonderful. Very clean stimulant, with quite a bit of euphoria. Mind is calm yet stimulated.  Body rush still going strong.  Slight dehydration present at this time but nothing more than you would expect from a stimulant. Ingest several alcoholic beverages.  Mixing well.
Still feeling great with a bit of a moreish quality but altogether feeling very good.

Coming down. Not bad at all. Feel slightly dehydrated and wanting more alcohol. Still stimulated. Altogether a small dose with a very positive reaction. Lots of euphoria, nice speedy vibe, easy comedown. Way better than any ritalin experience I've had. Definatley a novel RC with potential. risk of abuse yet to be determined :-)

erowid.citation: likuidpaper. "The Bomb: experience with Ethylphenidate (ID 100914)". Erowid.org. Aug 27, 2013. erowid.org/exp/100914
